name: Pocket Golf Master
description:
• A realistic and challenging 2D golf experience
• Full-swing swipe motion that is easy to learn, hard to master
• Read the slope of the green to make the perfect putt
• Fully procedurally-generated holes--each hole is a totally new challenge
• Play against an opponent who gets more difficult as your skills improve--you always have a challenge
• Start off with single-hole matches and eventually compete against your opponent in epic 18-hole showdowns
• Avoid sand traps and the rough by swinging straight and true
• Practice makes perfect--learn how hard to swing to land the ball perfectly on the green

--Originally created for iOS, now available on itch.io
